thread.title: Lindsey McWilliams
thread.title_full: Consumers Plumbing reviewed by Lindsey McWilliams

author: Lindsey McWilliams
title: Lindsey McWilliams
text: My 25-year-old Williams furnace generator died and I couldn't get the same replacement part. Consumers Plumbing had the best price for the updated model but said it would take five to eight business days to arrive. It got here in two business days. Hard to complain about great prices and fast shipping.
